channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Microsoft Sentinel Ninja Training - the April 2025 update
item.description:
Microsoft Sentinel is a cutting-edge, cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution designed to help security professionals protect their organizations from today’s complex threats. Our Ninja Training program is here to guide you through every aspect of this powerful tool.
If you’ve explored our Microsoft Sentinel Ninja Training in the past, it’s time to revisit as we have updated the content with the latest new features, Webinars and important changes in our documentation.
Some of the changes included in this update:
Recent webinars to help you with the transition to the unified security operation...
